title: Where can I find BTS song meanings or interpretations of BTS' song lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can always find meanings/interpretations of BTS songs on Youtube. Just type in the song name and if there is no MV for the song, the first result would probably be the videoes I am talking about. If there is an MV, it would be on the second or third number. You can also find it on Genius Lyrics (I forgot the website name, sry)

There is a you tube channel called Bookish Theories that does a good job on many of their songs and take you through the associated references to books, art etc. Another is DKDKTV that does a good job of explaining Korean cultural references that non-Koreans may not get.
